description: An illustration of a person wearing a yellow hazmat suit that full covers their body and head: there is a plastic visor covering the person's eyes and nose and a breathing mask covering their mouth. The person is wearing black gloves and boots and holds in their left hand a broom that appears to be attached via hose to an apparatus which the person carries on their back; this could be a tool to clean up and store hazardous material.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
